definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: The receiver's name and address of international mail should be written in English or French.
sentences.chinese: 對於國際郵件，收件人名址應用英文或法文書寫。

sentences.english: Translated into French prose from a poem by Thomas Moore.
sentences.chinese: 散文翻譯成法文，從詩的托馬斯莫爾。

sentences.english: Barney knew scantiest amount of French and not a syllable of anything else.
sentences.chinese: 巴尼只懂一點點法文，其他外語一個字都不會。

sentences.english: My knowledge of French helped me a lot while I was travelling in France.
sentences.chinese: 我在法國旅行時，我的法文知識幫了我大忙。

sentences.english: He doesn't know French at all.
Additionally, The Wine Advocate is translated into the French language.
sentences.chinese: 此外，《葡萄酒倡導家》出版了法文版。

sentences.english: In fact, today, i was going to talk about the "f-words", but i found that all of the explanations are too long.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，今天，我本來想要跟妳們說些法文的髒話。

sentences.english: I translated the article from Chinese to French.
sentences.chinese: 我把文章從中文翻譯成了法文。

sentences.english: It is no less difficult to learn Italian than French.
sentences.chinese: 義大利文就和法文一樣難學。

sentences.english: FIDIC is the International Federation of Consulting Engineers of the French acronym.
sentences.chinese: 菲迪克是國際顧問工程師聯合會的法文縮寫。

sentences.english: Salome is one-act tragedy of Wilde written in French.
sentences.chinese: 《莎樂美》是王爾德用法文寫成的一部獨幕悲劇。

sentences.english: Francis translated that French novel by himself.
sentences.chinese: 法蘭西斯獨力翻譯那本文法文小說。

sentences.english: She planned to go to France to study French, but that is out of the queston now.
sentences.chinese: 她原打算到法國去學習法文，但是現在不行了。

sentences.english: Today the website will only be available in English and French.
sentences.chinese: 今天，該網站將只在英文和法文版。

sentences.english: At college, English was his major and French was his minor.
sentences.chinese: 在大學時，他主修英語，選修法文。

sentences.english: I was very keen on Latin and French poetry.
sentences.chinese: 我酷愛拉丁文和法文的詩歌。
